lines.text: With every month that passes things will become easier for you. Six months from now you'll be accepted here.
By nine people out of ten.
Yes, I was wrong. No matter who they are, no matter what they've done, you can't treat human beings as though they were less than human... without becoming less than human yourself.
Nothing to be frightened of in Denfield - nothing at all...

[after watching a newsreel about the liberation of Belsen]
I knew. I knew there were such places. We all knew.
He is dead! Hitler is dead!
